"But in what position are we going to at- tack him? I have been at the outposts today and it is impossible to say where his chief forces are situated," said Prince Andrew. 
He wished to explain to Dolgoriikov a plan of attack he had himself formed. 
"Oh, that is all the same," Dolgoriikov said quickly, and getting up he spread a map on the table. "All eventualities have been fore- seen. If he is standing before Brunn . . ."
